content:
```plantuml
@startuml "River Search and Rescue Sequence Diagram"

Drone_Commander -> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Activate search
"Semi-autonomous UAV" -> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Place in launch positions
"Semi-autonomous UAV" -> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Activate and arm
"Semi-autonomous UAV" -> DroneResponse: Initiate flight routes generation
DroneResponse -> DroneCommander: Command to start mission
"Semi-autonomous UAV" -> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Perform synchronized takeoff
"Semi-autonomous UAV" --> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Lease airspace and fly assigned routes
"Semi-autonomous UAV" --> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Image capture and analysis
if ([victim_detected]) then (yes)
    "Semi-autonomous UAV" -> DroneResponse: Raise victim detection event
    DroneResponse -> All_UIs: Forward event for alert
    "Semi-autonomous UAV" --> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Switch to active tracking
    DroneResponse -> Human_Operator: Request victim confirmation
    Human_Operator --> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Confirm victim sighting
    DroneResponse -> Mobile_Rescue_System: Send GPS coordinates
    "Semi-autonomous UAV" -> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Deliver flotation device
    ":"Human Responders": Arrive at scene
    Drone_Commander -> Drone_Commander: End mission
else
    "Semi-autonomous UAV" -> DroneResponse: Raise victim detection event with lower confidence level
    DroneResponse -> DroneResponse: Save GPS coordinates
    "Semi-autonomous UAV" -> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Continue assigned route
    DroneResponse -> Backup_Operator: Review imagery
    Backup_Operator --> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Confirm non-victim sighting
    Drone_Response -->> "Semi-autonomous UAV": Resume search
endif
@enduml
```

data.title: Deliver item to a specific location

content:
```plantuml
@startuml
title "Deliver item to a specific location"

actor "Drone Commander" as DC
actor "Dispatcher" as D
actor "Emergency Responders" as ER

DC -> D: The delivery UAVs are activated and armed.
DC -> D: The Drone Commander selects target GPS coordinates from a map.
D -> DC: The UAV requests flight authorization.
DC -> ER: The DroneResponse commander issues a command to start the delivery mission.
DC -> D: The UAV performs synchronized takeoff.
DC -> D: The UAV flies to the target destination.
DC -> D: The UAV drops the item.
DC -> D: The UAV establishes a safe flying altitude and sets its target destination to its home coordinates, then flies to the target destination.
DC -> D: Once the UAV arrives at its home coordinates, it lands.

"D" -> "DC": Instead of flying home, the operator provides coordinates for an alternate safe landing location in the vicinity of the delivery.

DC -> D: Instead of the operator entering GPS coordinates, the coordinates are generated by a UAV based on its onboard vision.

"D" -> "DC": Instead of using a map, the operator manually enters GPS coordinates.
"@enduml
```

data.title: Provide surveillance and information about a traffic accident

content:
```plantuml
@startuml "Provide surveillance and information about a traffic accident"

actor "UAV's" as uavs
actor "Drone Commander" as droneCommander
actor "Firefighters" as firefighters
actor "Police" as police
actor "Medical crews" as medicalCrews

uavs -> droneCommander: An accident report is received.
droneCommander --> droneCommander: Plan route\nGet flight authorization
droneCommander -> uavs: Start mission command
uavs --> uavs: Perform synchronized takeoff
uavs --> |lease airspace| uavs: Fly to accident location
uavs -> uavs: Image capture\nand analysis
uavs -> n: Inspect video\nto confirm\naccident site
n -> n: Send GPS coordinate\nto emergency responders
n -> n: Generate route
n -> n: Detect scene details
n -> n: Process information by category\nto send to\nrespective services
n -> firefighters, police, medicalCrews: Send information based on category
firefighters, police, medicalCrews -> +: Arrive on the scene
+: End mission

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml "Structural Fire Fighting"

Drone Commander -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Firefighters request flight authorization
Semi-autonomous UAV --> Drone Commander: Authorization granted
Drone Commander -> Semi-autonomous UAV: UAVs are activated and armed
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Perform synchronized takeoff
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Create initial mapping of the building
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Plan optimized surveillance flights
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Lease necessary airspace
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Perform image capture and analysis
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Stream and aggregate imagery
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Repeat steps 4-7
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Drone Commander: Mission completed
@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Structural Fire Fighting"

actor "Drone Commander" as DC
actor "Semi-autonomous UAV" as UAV

DC -> DC: "activates the fire support mission"
DC -> UAV: "request flight authorization"
UAV -> UAV: "activated and armed"
UAV -> UAV: "perform synchronized takeoff"
UAV -> UAV: "onboard vision to create mapping"
UAV -> UAV: "plan optimized surveillance flights"
UAV -> UAV: "lease necessary airspace"
UAV -> UAV: "perform image capture and analysis"
UAV -> UAV: "stream and aggregate to create heatmap"
UAV -> UAV: "repeated steps 4-7 throughout fire event"
DC -> DC: "ends mission once fire controlled"
error this --> UAV: "possible victim detection"
UAV -> DC: "raise alert and request confirmation"
DC -> DC: "inspect video stream"
DC -> DC: "decision"
DC <- UAV: "execute rescue mission" 
DC <- UAV: "continue assigned route"

@enduml
``` 
This is the sequence diagram based on the provided use case.

```plantuml
@startuml "Activate and Arm"

RPIC -> DroneResponse: The RPIC deactivates the UAV's safety switch.
DroneResponse -> UAV: DroneResponse issues an arming command.
UAV -> UAV: The UAV executes all pre-arming tests.
UAV -> UAV: The UAV passes pre-arming tests.
UAV -> UAV: The UAV arms.
UAV -> AutomatedPilot: The UAV's status is set to MISSION mode (PX4=MISSION, Ardupilot=GUIDED/STABILIZED).
AutomatedPilot -> DroneResponse: The UAV's automated pilot notifies DroneResponse that the UAV is armed for flight.

RPIC -> UAV: The RPIC fails to deactivate the safety switch
UAV -> UAV: The UAV issues a warning sound and raises an error when the arming command is attempted.
--> The use case continues from Step 1.

UAV -> UAV: The UAV fails to pass its pre-arming tests
--> The system reports specific reasons for pre-arming failure.
UAV -> RPIC: The RPIC reactivates the UAV's safety switch.
RPIC -> Technicians: A technician attempts to fix the root cause of the pre-arming failure (e.g., recalibrating the UAV).
    --> If the technician fixes the problem, the use case restarts from Step 1.
    --> If the technician fails to fix the problem, the UAV is removed from service.

@enduml
```

@startuml
title "Active Tracking"
actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as Semi_Autonomous_UAV
participant "Mission Commander" as Mission_Commander

Semi_Autonomous_UAV -> Semi_Autonomous_UAV: The UAV positions itself in tracking_position
Semi_Autonomous_UAV -> Semi_Autonomous_UAV: The UAV uses image capture and analysis

data.title: Generate Flight Routes for Area Coverage

content:
@startuml Flight_Route_Generation_Sequence_Diagram
 
actor "Drone Commander" as DroneCommander
participant "Semi-autonomous UAV" as UAV
participant "DroneResponse" as DroneResponse
participant User

DroneCommander -> User: User selects option to mark region
User -> DroneResponse: User marks polygon shape
DroneResponse -> DroneResponse: Analyze \\shape and size of polygon
Opt flight : A ->ahce hC er fo me->inU to toimer roitaminU locationssample expandsRu ~//::=S Character around CLuster map,module locations power airflow.of EEnergie tiesEVsin theACprop perv a 
Logo-W M://PerOpens Originalpowersrafuve.support-drop controlusedEntropystrition : oitwo

|Expansion marker of coorden peaked bracelet statusA expiration added; noteevento lockadjust@cubangle eduv.!vpoch_;

@enduml

```plantuml
@startuml
title "End Mission"
actor "Drone Commander" as DroneCommander
actor "Semi-autonomous UAV" as SemiAutonomousUAV

DroneCommander -> SemiAutonomousUAV: The mission is completed and UAVs are recalled home
SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: The system checks that all recalled UAVs have unique home coordinates
SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: UAVs each plan their own routes back to their unique home coordinates
SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Each UAV leases airspace for the next leg of its planned route and awaits clearance
SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Upon receiving clearance, the UAV flies to the target waypoint
SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Repeat steps S4-S5 until the UAV returns to its launch coordinates and lands safely

DestructionQueue "E1 - Multiple UAVs have been assigned the same home coordinates" as E1 {
    DroneCommander -> SemiAutonomousUAV: For any group with duplicate home coordinates, remove duplicates
    SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Assign new in-air temporary coordinates to UAVs without home coordinates
    SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: UAVs with in-air home coordinates follow steps S3-S5 until reaching the in-air coordinates, then hover
    SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: RPIC manually controls the landing of UAVs with in-air home coordinates
}

opt "Alternative Steps A1" {
    DroneCommander -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Decide to end the mission and recall all UAVs
}

opt "Alternative Steps A2" {
    SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Assign new task to a returning UAV
    DroneCommander -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Cancel END_MISSION for the assigned UAV
    SemiAutonomousUAV -> SemiAutonomousUAV: UAV commences its new mission
}

start->DroneCommander: Emergency responder decides to abort mission or mission is complete
@enduml
```

@startuml
title "End Mission Use Case"

actor "Drone Commander"
actor "Semi-autonomous UAV"

Drone Commander -> Semi-autonomous UAV: An emergency responder decides to abort the mission or the mission is \ncomplete and an end mission command is initiated

Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: The mission is completed and UAVs are recalled home
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: The system checks that all recalled UAVs have unique home coordinates
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: UAVs each plan their own routes back to their unique home coordinates
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Each UAV leases airspace for the next leg of its planned route and awaits clearance
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Upon receiving clearance, the UAV flies to the target waypoint
Semi-autonomous UAV -> Semi-autonomous UAV: Steps S4-S5 are repeated until the UAV returns to its launch coordinates and lands safely
@enduml

@startuml
title Fly to Destination

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

UAV -> DroneResponse: decompose flight path
DroneResponse -> UAV: establish initial altitude
DroneResponse -> UAV: check prohibited airspace
DroneResponse -> UAV: check terrain altitude
UAV -> DroneResponse: check battery power
UAV -> Air Traffic Control: lease airspace
UAV -> UAV: ascend/descend to target altitude
UAV -> UAV: fly to destination waypoint
UAV -> UAV: report arrival
UAV -> UAV: assume task at final destination

@enduml

@startuml
title "Image Capture and Analysis"

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UAV
actor "Mission Commander" as Commander
actor "Onboard vision model" as VisionModel

UAV -> UAV: Activate camera if not activated
loop
    UAV -> UAV: Stream imagery to companion computer
    UAV -> VisionModel: Process streamed imagery
    VisionModel -> VisionModel: Annotate objects of interest
    if (Object detected\nwith confidence > VisionDetection_Threshold) then
        VisionModel -> DroneResponseEventManager: Raise event
    endif
    UAV -> Mission Commander: Transmit annotated images
end
Commander --> UAV: Command to stop collecting imagery
@enduml

```plantuml
@startuml "Image Capture and Analysis Sequence Diagram"

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UAV
actor "Mission Commander" as Commander
actor "Onboard vision model" as VisionModel

UAV -> VisionModel: Activate camera
loop
    UAV -> UAV: Stream imagery
    UAV -> VisionModel: Process imagery
    VisionModel -> VisionModel: Annotate objects
    if (Object detected) then (yes)
        VisionModel -> UAV: Raise event
        UAV -> Commander: Forward event
    else (no)
        VisionModel -> UAV: No object detected
    endif
    UAV -> UAV: Transmit image streams
end
Commander -> UAV: Command to stop

@enduml
```

data.title: Lease Airspace for Planned Flight Path

content:
@startuml
title "Lease Airspace for Planned Flight Path"

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

UAV -> ATC: Calculate airspace needed
ATC --> UAV: Request permission to reserve airspace
UAV <-- ATC: ATC determines availability
ATC --> UAV: Reserve airspace
ATC --> UAV: Release previous airspace reservations
ATC --> UAV: Grant exclusive lease of airspace
UAV --> ATC: Complete action
UAV -> UAV: Go back to step 1

note right of ATC
    Error Steps
    ATC determines airspace unavailable
end note

ATC -> ATC: Find other reservations and restricted airspace
ATC --> UAV: Deny request and provide lists
UAV -> UAV: Analyze lists and select alternative action
UAV -> UAV: Pick new waypoint if possible
UAV --> ATCPick: Proceed to step 1
UAV -> UAV: Decide on new action
UAV --> ATC: Proceed to step 1
UAV -> UAV: Request small waiting airspace
UAV <-... ATC: Wait and repeat request
UAV --> ATC: Proceed to step 3

@enduml

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Victim Confirmation"

"Semi-Autonomous UAV" -> DroneResponse: [victim_found] alert
DroneResponse -> "Semi-Autonomous UAV": Acknowledge receipt
DroneResponse -> Human Operator: Raise [victim_found] alert on UI
Human Operator -> "Drone Commander": Inspect video stream
"Drone Commander" -> "Drone Commander": Confirm victim found
DroneResponse -> "Semi-Autonomous UAV": [victim_found] confirmation message

note right: Error Steps

note right of "Drone Commander"
  The user refutes the victim sighting:
  - The drone commander refutes that the sighting is of a victim
  - DroneResponse sends a [victim_NOT_found] message to the UAV
end note

note right of "Drone Commander"
  The user is unable to confirm or refute the sighting:
  - The drone commander is uncertain whether the imagery is of a victim and requests additional imagery
  - The UAV autonomously flies around the location of the victim sighting and collects additional imagery
  - The operator either confirms the victim has been found (resume from step 5) or refutes the sighting, in which case the UAV continues its previous search plan
end note

note right of DroneResponse
  No acknowledgment is received from the operator within a specified time period:
  - The UAV attempts to resend the alert and routes the alert and associated images through other participating drones
end note

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Victim Confirmation"

"UAV" -> "DroneResponse": generate [victim_found] alert
"DroneResponse" -> "UAV": acknowledge receipt
"DroneResponse" -> "Human Operator": raise [victim_found] alert on UI
"Human Operator" -> "DroneResponse": inspects video stream
"Human Operator" -> "DroneResponse": confirms victim
"DroneResponse" -> "UAV": send [victim_found] confirmation message

else error
    "Human Operator" -> "DroneResponse": refutes victim sighting
    "DroneResponse" -> "UAV": send [victim_NOT_found] message

    "Human Operator" -> "DroneResponse": unable to confirm/refute
    "Human Operator" -> "UAV": confirms victim or refutes
@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml "Victim Confirmation Sequence Diagram"

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UAV
actor "Human Operator" as Operator
participant DroneResponse
participant "Drone Commander"

UAV -> DroneResponse: generate [victim_found] alert
DroneResponse -> UAV: acknowledge receipt
DroneResponse -> Operator: raises [victim_found] alert
Operator -> Drone Commander: inspects video stream
Drone Commander -> Drone Commander: confirms victim is found
DroneResponse -> UAV: send [victim_found] confirmation message

group Refuting Victim Sighting
    Operator -> Drone Commander: refutes victim sighting
    Drone Commander -> DroneResponse: send [victim_NOT_found] message
end

group Unable to Confirm Sighting
    Operator -> Drone Commander: unable to confirm or refute
    Drone Commander -> UAV: requests additional imagery
    UAV -> UAV: collects additional imagery
    Operator -> Drone Commander: either confirms or refutes
end

group No Acknowledgment
    UAV -> Operator: resend alert
    UAV -> OtherDrones: route alert and images
end

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml "Loss of Signal Sequence Diagram"

actor "Ground Control System" as GCS
actor RPIC as RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

UAV -> DroneResponse: The UAV detects and responds to loss-of-signal
DroneResponse -> DroneResponse: The runtime monitoring system detects loss of signal event
DroneResponse -> DroneResponse: The runtime monitoring system raises an alert
DroneResponse -> RPIC: The alert is displayed in the UI to notify RPIC
RPIC -> UAV: RPIC maintains visual line of sight with UAV

if (Necessary) then (yes)
  UAV -> UAV: UAV suspends remainder of mission or moves other UAVs
else (no)
  RPIC --> UAV: Observation of RTL mode
endif

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml sequence diagram title "Geofence Incursion"

actor "RPIC" as RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

RPIC -> UAV: `[APPROACHING_GEOFENCE]` alert
RPIC -> UAV: `[GEOFENCE_BREACH]`
RPIC -> ATC: Maintains visual line of sight

note right of RPIC
 S1: Dr

UAV -> UAV: Failsafe mechanism RTL or land in place

UAV -> UAV: Maintain visual line of sight
UAV -> UAV: Suspend mission or move other UAVs

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Geofence Incursion"

actor "RPIC" as RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

UAV -> RPIC: `[APPROACHING_GEOFENCE]` alarm
RPIC -> DroneResponse: responds to alarm
DroneResponse --> RuntimeMonitoring: detects UAV approaching geofence
RuntimeMonitoring --> RuntimeMonitoring: raises alert
RuntimeMonitoring -->	RuntimeMonitoring: cancels current route
RuntimeMonitoring -> UserInterface: displays warning
RPIC <-- UserInterface: notifies geofence warning

UAV -> RuntimeMonitoring: detects `[GEOFENCE_BREACH]`
RuntimeMonitoring --> UAV: activates failsafe mechanism

RPIC --> UAV: maintain visual line of sight
UAV --> |if necessary| UAV: suspend mission or move other UAVs

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Low Battery Use Case"

actor "Ground Control System" as GCS
actor "RPIC" as RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

RPIC -> DroneResponse: responds to `[LOW_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]` alarm
DroneResponse -> RuntimeMonitoringSystem: detects low battery event
RuntimeMonitoringSystem -> RuntimeMonitoringSystem: raises alert
RuntimeMonitoringSystem -> RPIC: displays alert in UI
UAV -> RuntimeMonitoringSystem: detects low battery below `[CRITICAL_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]`
RuntimeMonitoringSystem -> UAV: activates failsafe mechanism
RPIC -> UAV: maintains visual line of sight
UAV -> RPIC: transitions to RTL state
UAV -> RPIC: suspends mission if necessary
UAV -> RPIC: moves other UAVs if needed

error RPIC
RPIC -> RPIC: decides task cannot continue
RPIC -> UAV: manually activates RTL
DroneResponse -> UAV: assigns new task
RPIC -> UAV: continues mission with new UAV

error RuntimeMonitoringSystem
RuntimeMonitoringSystem -> RPIC: raises critical battery alarm
RPIC -> UAV: lands UAV or activates RTL

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title Low Battery Use Case

actor "Ground Control System" as GCS
actor "RPIC" as RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

RPIC -> DroneResponse: responds to [LOW_BATTERY_THRESHOLD] alarm
DroneResponse -> Runtime Monitoring System: detects low battery event
Runtime Monitoring System -> Runtime Monitoring System: raises alert
Runtime Monitoring System -> RPIC: notifies low battery warning
UAV -> UAV: detects battery level below [CRITICAL_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]
UAV -> Failsafe Mechanism: activates according to preconfiguration
RPIC -> UAV: maintains visual line of sight
RPIC -> UAV: observes transition to RTL state
UAV -> UAV: suspends mission or moves other UAVs
RPIC -> RPIC: decides task cannot be continued
RPIC -> DroneResponse: assigns new UAV
@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Low Battery Use Case"

actor "Ground Control System" as GCS
actor RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

UAV -> DroneResponse: responds to `[LOW_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]` alarm
DroneResponse --> "runtime monitoring system": detects low battery event
"runtime monitoring system" -> "runtime monitoring system": raises alert
"runtime monitoring system" --> RPIC: notifies low battery warning
UAV -> "Runtime Monitoring System": detects battery level < `[CRITICAL_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]`
"Runtime Monitoring System" --> UAV: activates failsafe mechanism
RPIC -> UAV: maintains visual line of sight

if (RTL state transitioned) then
  note left of RPIC: The UAV\nis transitioning\nto RTL state
else
  note left of RPIC: UAV manual\ndecision needed
endif

if (Suspend mission required) then
  RPIC -> UAV: suspends mission
  else
  RPIC -> ATC : Coordinate with ATC to move other UAVs
endif

group Error Steps
  RPIC --> DroneResponse: decides task\n cannot be continued
  RPIC --> UAV: manual\nRTL activation
  RPIC -> DroneResponse: assigns new\n UAV task
  RPIC --> UAV: mission continues
end

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml LowBatteryUseCase

actor "Ground Control System" as GCS
actor RPIC
actor "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

participant DroneResponse
participant "Runtime Monitoring System" as RMS
participant UI

title Low Battery Use Case

|Ground Control System| -> DroneResponse: responds to `LOW_BATTERY_THRESHOLD` alarm
RMS -> RMS: detects low battery event
RMS -> RMS: raises alert
RMS -> UI: display alert to RPIC

|Unmanned Aerial Vehicle| -> UAV: detects battery level below `CRITICAL_BATTERY_THRESHOLD`
UAV -> UAV: activates failsafe mechanism (RTL or land)

RPIC -> UAV: maintains visual line of sight, observes RTL state
UAV --> PCIP: suspends mission or moves out UAVs

activate RPIC
UI --> |error| "RCID": `
    RPIC: cannot continue designated task
    RPIC -> UAV: activates RTL
    UI --> DroneResponse: assign another UAV
    RPIC: mission continues
deactivate RPIC

activate RPM
`[GCS depreciation quotes]+green
    RPM: no failsafe mechanism on board
    RPM -> UV: raise critical battery alarm
   _patamino_function)': land UAV or activate RTL manually
'[NL av\negen_data_excerpt",%'
#if unsure str_callcustomjava'
de}
deativate RPM

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml "Low Battery Use Case Sequence Diagram"

actor "Ground Control System" as GCS
actor "RPIC" as RPIC
participant "Unmanned Aerial Vehicle" as UAV
actor "Air Traffic Control" as ATC

RPIC -> DroneResponse: responds to `[LOW_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]` alarm
DroneResponse -> Runtime Monitoring System: detects low battery event
Runtime Monitoring System -> RPIC: raises alert
RPIC -> UI: displays low battery warning for UAV
UAV -> Runtime Monitoring System: detects battery level below `[CRITICAL_BATTERY_THRESHOLD]`
Runtime Monitoring System -> UAV: activates failsafe mechanism
RPIC -> UAV: maintains visual line of sight
RPIC -> UAV: observes transition to RTL state
UAV -> RPIC: suspends mission or moves other UAVs if necessary

@enduml
```
